lead_paragraph: Jumaine Jones signed a one-year contract yesterday with the Phoenix Suns, adding an outside shooting threat to their roster. The 6-foot-8 Jones, a seven-year veteran, averaged a career-best 10.5 points for Charlotte last season. He is the third free-agent signing for the Suns in the off-season, joining point guard Marcus Banks and guard-forward Eric Piatkowski.
